title.quote: An Exact Method for (Constrained) Assortment Optimization Problems with Product Costs

extractions.description: The paper proposes an exact solution method for the problem of optimizing assortment decisions in the presence of product-specific costs under the multinomial logit model (MNL). The authors present a bounding procedure based on the approximation method of Feldman and Topaloglu (2015a) to provide tight lower and upper bounds quickly. Additionally, the authors adapt their method to handle constraints such as cardinality or space/resource capacity, significantly improving computational efficiency over existing methods.

type.justification: The paper involves computational experiments to evaluate the performance of the proposed method on a set of benchmark instances.
type.quote: Computational results are reported in Section 6.

name.justification: The paper addresses the problem of assortment optimization, a subfield of optimization dealing with decision-making under constraints.
name.quote: We study the problem of optimizing assortment decisions in the presence of product-specific costs when customers choose according to a multinomial logit model.

name.justification: The research is closely related to operations research, focusing on optimizing assortment decisions and handling constraints such as cardinality and resource capacity.
name.quote: This problem is NP-hard and approximate solutions methods have been proposed in the literature to obtain both lower and upper bounds in a tractable manner.
